feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
